content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted multiple commands to activate the arcgis environment using various paths, but all resulted in errors. I tried using different conda paths, including /opt/anaconda3, /opt/miniconda3, /home/katmai/miniconda3, /home/katmai/anaconda3, and /opt/anaconda3/envs/arcgispro-py3, but all returned errors stating that the path did not exist. I attempted to activate the environment using the path /home/katmai/anaconda3/envs/arcgispro-py3/bin/activate, but received an error message stating that the file or directory did not exist.
"""
